hero_subtitle: Creating functional and attractive digital solutions with a focus on quality and performance.
about_p1: Hi! I'm Benjamín Ramírez, a passionate Frontend-focused web developer. My journey into programming began with the desire to transform creative ideas into interactive and functional digital experiences.
about_p2: With a solid foundation in technologies like HTML, CSS, SASS, and JavaScript, I enjoy building clean, accessible, and high-performance interfaces. My goal is to add value through quality code and a continuous learning mindset, always seeking the next challenge to grow as a professional.
contact_description: Have a question, a proposal, or just want to say hello? Go ahead.
